trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.StatusEventRaised" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs> class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> status event argument classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs> classe é uma classe base abstrata para todos os <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> classes de argumento de evento de status.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave de ajuda associada ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword" />, and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs" /> com os valores <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword" /> e <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: A palavra-chave de ajuda associada ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The time the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: A hora em que o evento foi acionado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message" />, <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword" />, and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName" /> and <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.TimeStamp" /> values.
